@graph.schema:name: Algorithm
@graph.schema:description: A finite sequence of rigorous instructions used for computation.

@graph.schema:name: Computation
@graph.schema:description: The process of performing calculations and data processing.

@graph.schema:name: Problem
@graph.schema:description: A question or situation that requires a solution.

@graph.schema:name: Solution
@graph.schema:description: A solution or answer to a problem.

@graph.schema:name: Heuristic
@graph.schema:description: An approach to problem solving that may not be fully specified or may not guarantee correct or optimal results.

@graph.schema:name: Recommender System
@graph.schema:description: A system that makes recommendations for items or products based on user preferences or past behavior.

@graph.schema:name: Social Media
@graph.schema:description: Online platforms or tools that allow users to create, share, and interact with content, information, or other users.

@graph.schema:name: Formal Language
@graph.schema:description: A language that is defined by a set of rules and is used for mathematical or computational purposes.

@graph.schema:name: Initial State
@graph.schema:description: The starting state of a computation or process.

@graph.schema:name: Input
@graph.schema:description: Data or information that is entered into a system or process.

@graph.schema:name: Output
@graph.schema:description: Data or information that is produced or generated by a system or process.

@graph.schema:name: Final State
@graph.schema:description: The ending state of a computation or process.
